description: This file defines an Angular component named ScheduleComponent used for scheduling social media posts. It manages creating, listing, and canceling scheduled posts, integrating with an ApiService for backend interactions. The component template includes forms for inputting post details and displaying scheduled posts.

classes.name: ScheduleComponent
classes.description: An Angular component for scheduling social media posts, displaying scheduled posts, and allowing users to create or cancel posts.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that initializes the component by loading scheduled posts and social accounts.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the list of scheduled posts and social accounts from the API service.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the form fields to their default empty values.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Submits the form data to schedule a new post, then resets the form and reloads the data.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Cancels a scheduled post by its ID and reloads the list.
